graphql.query:
mutation customerRegister {
    customerRegister(input: {
        firstName: "Test"
        lastName: "User"
        email: "test@example.com"
    	password: "demo123"
    	passwordConfirmation: "demo123"
    }) {
        status
        success
        accessToken
        tokenType
        expiresIn
        customer {
            id
            firstName
            lastName
            name
            gender
            dateOfBirth
            email
            phone
            password
            apiToken
            customerGroupId
            subscribedToNewsLetter
            isVerified
            token
            notes
            status
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation customerLogin($email: String!, $password: String!, $remember: Boolean) {
    customerLogin(input: {
        email: $email
    	password: $password
        remember: $remember
    }) {
        status
        success
        accessToken
        tokenType
        expiresIn
        customer {
            id
            firstName
            lastName
            name
            gender
            dateOfBirth
            email
            phone
            password
            apiToken
            customerGroupId
            subscribedToNewsLetter
            isVerified
            token
            notes
            status
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation addItemToCart {
    addItemToCart(input: {
        productId: 12

        #     attributeId: 24

        #     quantity: 3

        #     productId: 1
        #     quantity: 2
